Message:
Big flowers, pretty flowers,
and lots and lots of other
colorful flowers.

With my arms full,
I made my way home.

Waiting for me there, though,
were the still bodies of Mom
and Dad.

...Hey, what’s wrong?
It’s impolite to sleep
on the floor, you know.
You guys need to go
sleep in your room.

Today’s the day you promised
we’d bake pie together.
I practiced lots and got pretty
good at baking, you know.

I still can’t make it
as well as you can, Mom,
but I’ll try my best.
So please...try some, okay?

Please... Laugh and tell me
I’m not very good at cooking
again, okay...?
Hey, why won’t you answer me?
